directions: Prepare and bake cake according to package directions, using a 9x13 inch pan.  Cool on a wire rack for 30 minutes.  Using the end of a wooden spoon handle, poke 12 holes in warm cake.
Pour butterscotch topping over cake. Allow to cool completely.  Spread with whipped topping, sprinkle with candy bars.  Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
3 (2.16 ounce) bars chocolate-covered crispy peanut butter candy
title: Butterscotch Chocolate Cake
